short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Volume: Enjoy enhanced sound while watching videos and listening to audio content online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Volume - Boost for Chrome  is your all-in-one solution for enhancing your browsing experience while prioritizing privacy and convenience. With  Boost Volume - Boost for Chrome, you can amplify your browser's volume by up to 600%, modify your user agent to emulate various devices or browsers seamlessly, and enable right clicks, copy functions, and text selection on websites that restrict these actions. Additionally, you can conveniently save images in JPG, PNG, or WebP formats with just a click, and safeguard your privacy by preventing IP address leaks through WebRTC deactivation. Experience a smoother, more versatile browsing experience with Boost Volume - Boost for Chrome today.
